trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> allows multiple simultaneous connections to a database, even in embedded mode.

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> allows multiple simultaneous connections to a database, even in embedded mode.

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> allows multiple simultaneous connections to a database, even in embedded mode.

trans-unit.source: from single application running in embedded mode

seg-source.mrk: from single application running in embedded mode

target.mrk: from single application running in embedded mode

trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is also fully multi-threaded, and you can have multiple threads active at the same time. However, JDBC semantics impose some limitations on multi-threading. See the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.

However, JDBC semantics impose some limitations on multi-threading.
